title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 400.7 - Facility participation in title XVIII program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 400.7 - Facility participation in title XVIII program

State Regulations

Every facility that provides a service which is
reimbursable under the provisions of title XVIII of the Social Security Act
shall make application to be an approved provider of such services pursuant to
such title. If approved, the facility shall participate in such program and
make appropriate claims for payment in any instance in which a patient is
eligible for benefits under such program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
400.7

Amended

New

York State Register November 13, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 46, eff. 11/13/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
